snippet: The Rev. Robert Harrison, a Capuchin priest who was an assistant principal at the Bronx school, said the abuse of 10 minors occurred in the 1970s and 1980s, authorities from his religious order said.
abstract: Rev Robert Harrison, Capuchin priest and assistant principal at Cardinal Hayes High School in Bronx, is dismissed after admitting he sexually abused about 10 minors in New York region and Milwaukee in 1970's and 1980's; school's president sends letters to parents saying no abuse involved students at Cardinal Hayes.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Robert Harrison, a Capuchin priest who was an assistant principal at the Bronx school, said the abuse of 10 minors occurred in the 1970s and 1980s, authorities from his religious order said.

headline.main: Bronx School Ousts Priest After Admissions of Abuse
headline.print_headline: Bronx School Ousts Priest After Admissions of Abuse
